main.name: Sarthak Kashyap
main.bio: My name is Sarthak, I'm a Full Stack Developer. Currently I'm a 3rd Year B.Tech. UnderGrad at Birla Institute of Technology, Mesra.

resume.skillmessage: I'm fond of solving DSA and cp problems for the seconds of satisfaction I get when my code gets accepted

work.title: Extensive Full-Stack Ecommerce Website
work.description: Built an interactive and responsive frontend using ReactJS • Handled action calls using NodeJs using ExpressJs in the backend and Redux in the frontend • Defined roles of users (browsing products using filters, add item to cart, order, change profile) and admin (adding products, managing orders, managing users) • MongoDB used a Storage database.

work.title: Web-Forum for Photos
work.description: Real-time Dynamic Responsive web application to host collections of Photographs using ReactJS • Browse through limitless categories of photographs, Add posts after logging in as user • Backend action calls handled by NodeJS using ExpressJS • MongoDB used as Database.
